coreAtributes.name: Crotchless Boxers
coreAtributes.description: A pair of boxers that don't really cover anything. Not practical at all.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s boxers and roughly pull them off [npc.her] groin.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your boxers and roughly pulls them off your groin.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s boxers and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her] groin.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.legs] through the jock bands as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the jocsktrap up along [npc.her] legs.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the boxers up along your [pc.legs].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.legs] through the boxers before sliding them onto [npc2.her] groin.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the boxers up along [npc2.her] [npc2.legs].
